content.detailedDescription: I feel compelled to relate this incident (summer of 1959 or '60) even though so many years have passed.  one summer evening when i was in the explorer scouts our leader, after our meeting, asked if the unit would like to hike down to our local small-town reservoir to check out the night sky.  it was a beautiful clear and warm evening and a perfect time to go star searching.  at the reservoir there was a pumping station built out over the water with a concrete cat-walk leading out to the station, a perfect place for viewing.  we were gathered along the walkway when someone shouted "there's a falling star."  a mega-bright glowing, reddish/orange/yellow circular orb of light appeared over the horizon, streaking through the sky, did not burn out or disappear, but instead, seemingly a second or less,  slowed and hovered almost directly over our heads. stationary only momentarily, it began to circle the periphery of the water, slightly above the treetops.  the reservoir is surrounded by trees and woods and the water area covers multiple acres. if memory serves it circled the area approximately 3 times and then as abruptly as it appeared it was gone in a flash streaking back over the horizon from the way it had come. i don't remember anyone speaking during the event or moving in the least.  i have never had a feeling quite like that; totally awestruck and immobile.  i do not think i could have moved to save my life and i was not able to speak until after the object had disappeared.  thinking back over the years, but even more so recently, i have thought it odd that walking home that evening from the reservoir i don't remember anyone really talking much about what we had just seen, neither our leader nor the 10-12 other boys in our group.  nor did we ever mention it again.  when back for a high school reunion in 2012 one boy who was present with us that startling  night had no memory of the event.  the others had either died or moved away or were otherwise unavailable and the troop leader was long deceased; no one else left to review our memories together.  it is also odd to me that when i got home that evening my mother had gone to bed, much earlier than usual and she ordinarily would wait up until i was home; the also my dad was home and he always worked very late.  timewise i should have arrived home no later than 9:30 or 10 p.M.  at the time i did not wonder why my father was home so early, several hours before his usual time and my mother in bed so early.  i can not now rationalize why there was such a discrepancy in what appears now as some lost hours.  i do not remember looking at a clock upon arriving home.  i did mention what i had seen to my father and he did not take my description of the event seriously to my utter disappointment and no one else to report it to; no significant police presence and calling the sheriff most certainly would have been a lost cause.  at the time there was an air force radar installation (hi-point area of bellefontaine, ohio) just a few miles away and in the direction from which the object appeared and afterward disappeared.  at 14 years old i could not even envision calling the air force.  so that is my  description of the event after all these years. so thank you for the opportunity to report an obvious unidentified flying object which made absolutely no sound,created no heat or wind drafts and definitely was not swamp gas, northern lights, an airplane or helicopter, weather balloon or other man-made body.  i am now retired, do consider myself somewhat accomplished, rational, intelligent with several advanced degrees and so far have avoided the dreaded alzheimers.  thank you so much for your efforts and for affording me the opportunity to finally report this incident.
content.summary: Brilliant glowing orb streaked down in night sky, stopped, then hovered over the heads of our boy scout troop.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend talking in our parking lot.I was sort of looking up at the sky as we were talking then i saw what looked like balloons then like birds in a triangle .We noticed that they were flying very fast i had not time to film it there were 6 small star like objects in formation with no lights but looked like reflective metal it flew in formation straight over our heads it individual star shaped object was independent of the others as you could see each one was not joined together but flying in formation it was very exciting and left us without an answer to what we say in the clear sky with the moon very bright....We lost sight as it flew pretty fast and just kind of disapeard in the night sky
content.summary: looked up and saw what at first looked like a small flock of birds

content.detailedDescription:
On the date and approximate time mentioned above, i was photographing the sunset over a flooded stock man's pond about nine miles east of huntington,ut.
i noticed a beautiful moon rise over cedar mountain and shot some pictures with an 18-250mm lens.  next,at approximately 6:40pm,i used a 150-500 mm sigma optically stabilized lens with a 1.4 tele-converter attached.  with the 0.6x cropping factor of the sensor on the canon t4i camera the total focal length was 1160mm at the 500mm setting. as always, i quickly brushed any dust or artifacts off the lens glass before taking a picture using aperture priority mode. upon focusing on the nearly full moon, i noticed a triangular object moving in the bottom right corner of the moon and immediately suspected a bug and thought to myself, "easily removed in photoshop".  between the first and second photo, i switched the camera to manual in order to bracket exposures by changing shutter speeds.  i noticed the object  had moved across the face of the moon and snapped another picture which was  slightly over exposed.  the third and last image shows the object (shadow?) just right of top dead center of the moon's face and disappears as if it's actually following the moon's curvature.  these photos transpired over the course of about 10-15 seconds due to switching camera mode and slow auto focus. the iso for all images was 400 and shutter speeds were 1/20th of a second to 1/30th at an aperture of f-9. i sent a forth photo which shows a thin veil of cirrus clouds moving across the moon's top as a "control shot."
on my way back to huntington, i thought about the object and determined it couldn't have been a conventional aircraft or bug and was eager to download the images.
 i've studied the images at magnifications beyond actual pixels, sharpened, and am convinced it's an opaque object because the pixels block light reflected from the moon; the  dark triangular area appears to be quite uniform in all the photos and clearly blocks reflected light. i thought it might be a contrail reflecting off clouds but have also ruled out that possibility. i've uploaded the original jpegs and if you want, i'll send the raws which would probably be better at determining what this anomaly is.  if you have any ideas, please notify me by e-mail.  i'll eagerly await a response.
content.summary: Wittnessed object across face of nearly full moon, possible shawdow.

content.detailedDescription: On friday oct 30 arpund 8-8:15 pm, i was driving with my two kids on 157 in caseyville, il. we had just picked up taco bell and were on our way back home in collinsville. while drivingetting and singing songs with my son, i looked up and saw a stationary triangular aircraft with several yellow lights and a blue-green light flashing in the center. it was fairly close and just hovered there. i was too scared to stop or grab my phone to take a picture. i watched it as long as i could (about a minute) until i drove under it.
content.summary: Stationary dark triangle with several yellow lights and one blue-green light in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancé and i were driving home from freeland wa on whidbey island to clinton wa, also on whidbey island, when -- as we crested a hill -- i saw, over the tree line to the south, five very bright yellow objects that appeared to be 'hanging' in the air over puget sound (as if they were lights strung together).  my fiancé did not see them.  as we went down the hill i lost sight of the lights.  i was very curious to see them again, and to have her see them. i wanted to see if i could rule out airplanes as an explanation. these lights were not 'normal' for the area, which has lots of air traffic but these did not appear to be aircraft lights.

and they were not chinese lanterns, based on movement patterns and the duration of the sighting.  

we went to a beach called double bluff on south whidbey island.  the lights were still visible, and presented in varying degrees of brightness/intensity.  initially they just hovered. but literally as we walked from the car they seemed to move away, dimming as they did so.

some faded away, though two remained in view and gradually became much brighter (see photos).  eventually they all gradually faded and disappeared.  others appeared, and brightened.  of note is the fact that when the one object moved northeast, the light remained bright and did not vary, as an airplane would as it moved and turned. it's light remained constant.  no wing lights were visible.

there were aircraft visible as well, to the south, likely traveling to and from seatac airport.  these lights were decidedly different than the anomalous lights. they were white, with blinking running lights. it was good to have the comparison in real time.

through binoculars the objects were emitting too much light to determine a shape, though one also appeared to suddenly 'morph' into a triangular form (seen through binoculars). this 'morphing' was the most surprising and shocking part of this observation, since the appearance had been vague and ill-defined prior to this (brief) change.  all seemed to have an amorphous, pulsing reddish light in the center.  

there was a low, constant pulsating sound in the bass range which neither of us had heard before. it did not get louder or quieter, but remained constant for as long as we observed the phenomenon.  the sound was not produced by a train or aircraft or boat. there could be other rational explanations for the noise (and for the lights, of course.  we are very skeptical, sober-minded people).  but it was also very unusual and strange.

we live in the puget sound region, and are familiar with aircraft of various descriptions.  while we cannot definitively rule out that these were aircraft, our experience seeing many different aircraft at night and in differing weather conditions from boeing plants, paine field, sea-tac airport, and whidbey island naval air station persuaded us that these were something else.

our only guess is that atmospheric conditions might have had some extraordinary effect on normal aircraft lights. there were very few clouds, far to the south. 

we've never seen lights like these.  they were exactly what the term 'ufo' means -- unidentified flying objects. we went away without any idea what they were. 

steve
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Yellowish-white lights with hints of red at center hovered, moved independently,appeard to make deep bass pulsation.

content.detailedDescription: Was moved to take a pic of the sun rising over the clouds at 8 am that morn, had a feeling i was going to see some anomilies on the picture, to my surprise it showed quite a bit of info, as i took a number of shoots with my sony camera, the red planet first caught my eye in shock, how big it was, then i noticed a small whitish oval shaped object off to the left of the picture, which kept rising upward each shot, i also saw the shadow or invisible round smaller object in the photo between the larger whitish object and the red planet.... i am amazed to see so much under cover of the suns ray's that would have been hidden to my naked eye and before i took the last picture i felt the need to take one more picture as i walked further onto the lot  i was standing in, in order to verify the objects that i had spoted in the earlier pictures... please let me know what you all think thanks, dee.
content.summary: There was a oval whitish object, along with a shadow or invisible smaller round object, also red planet

content.detailedDescription: I was coming from a friend's house and saw a bunch fire trucks blocking the street.  i looked up and saw a solid dull blood red light hoovering just about the tree lines. the light were coming up market street to intersect baltimore street. the light paused above the intersect point of market and baltimore for a few seconds and shot vertically up until you could not see the light.  i ask my friend............Did you just see that?
content.summary: Solid red light no sound and shaped like circle ball.

content.detailedDescription:
Oct 29 2015,had come to the end of my day and pulled into truck stop to begin my rest period, bunked down around 9pm, vividly remember waking on a table, the room was pitch black except for the area right around the table, as for the table itself it was red, not the material itself, the color seemed to come from within, i was lying on my back, rolled my head to the left and two being standing side by side stared down at me, i distictly remember thinking to myself that i felt nothing from them, almost like looking at a piece of furniture, not like the feeling you get from a flesh and blood being, it was at this moment i panicked and grabbed a...Tool that was on a table next to my head, the tool was cylindrical and shown white hot on one end no cord on the other, i grabbed the entity closest by what i percieve to be its wrist and jammed the tool into the entities are causing it distress, that is when the second entity standing near the first reached out and touched me on my shoulder causing me to jump up in the bunk of my truck, seeming to be awakened, one moment im fighting next im sitting up in my bunk terrified, no inbetween, one to the other, terror, sadness and an acute knowledge of what just happened not at all muddled by sleep.

the beings description.

 tall,wearing burgandy skin tight unitards, shoulders went up and to a point,arms were long, had the been at their side the hands would touch the floor,the hands had no fingers but were like rubber pincers and moved very mechanically, skin color was flesh toned, eyes were covered by large black lenses giving them the appearance of greys eyes but i could faintly see a pair of smaller eyes underneath,small nose and small mouth with slight lips, when i grabbed being one by the arm my hand fit completely around and felt mechanical underneath.
content.summary: Awakened on a table flanked by two beings

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and a boeing 777 flew over on approach to lax when i noticed the orb hovering, i called over some coworkers (7 people) and we watched it for about 2 hours, it was slowly moving to the west. it would move then hover then made some round patterns. it was silver and was emitting a pulsating white light. it was above the planes on approach to lax i would estimate 20,000 ft. then it disappeared. it was to small to register on a picture.
content.summary: Small silver orb emitting white light

content.detailedDescription: I was working and cleaning outside when i saw at first three bright balls just slowly floating,i wondered what they were,balloons,plastic bags maybe.I remember thinking fuengirola market is on so probably carrier bags caught in the wind.Then i saw another two or three  maybe four following.At that moment i thought hey they look just like the orbs i've seen on you tube.Thats when i decided to film them with my iphone however every time i am pointing the camera at them i couldn't see them on the screen.I could see them clearly looking over the phone but still not on screen but i carried on filming.I then stopped had  quick look on playback then started filming again.I just thought point it at them and follow them and then i'll check it later.When i checked i could briefly see a couple.Thats why i contacted you guys because maybe you can enhance or zoom or whatever to see what they were.I am pretty sure i was pointing straight at them.I just hope it won't be a waste of your time ie if they are balloons or something like that.I filmed them until they went over the house and out of view.
content.summary: Five or six orbs or globes slowly gliding first thinking balloons or bags? but just don't know

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst in my backyard at home at around 8.00pm on october 24 2015 i was preparing to video and take pictures of the moon as i've done in the past  with my new camera a (nikon p900) 83x optical zoom which is equivalent to a 2,000mm lens, perfect for this sort of activity, anyway i was playing around with the zoom on the camera and took some still shots before deciding to zoom all the way into the moon and then started to video record the moon, i was facing in a north easterly direction, (camera settings were 1920x1080 at 25 frames per second), i zoomed in and out of the moon several times and then zoomed back in fully and started to record the perimeter of the moon (the lower half) from right to left, as i got to the left side i noticed something dark for a split second on the lower part of the frame which was visible on the lcd viewfinder, initially i thought it was birds, anyway the next day i loaded the still shots and video recordings on my computer  to view on my 28" 4k monitor and that's when i realized the recording i thought had birds in the lower frame was actually black round circles in a group that whizzed past in the lower part of the video frame, some of the circles were different sizes which indicates to me they were further away from the closer larger ones,  i have shared the viewing of this video with friends, some family and work colleges for their opinion and some have suggested contacting an organization such as yours and for your opinion on what these are?. can you please give me your expert determination on this video footage i'm submitting to you it would be greatly appreciated, ive also submitted a still shot as a background image for pc monitors at your end if your interested.

kind regards

"the man from down under"
content.summary: Video taken of the moon - at 1 minute 19 seconds the objects are visible for 1 second

content.detailedDescription: 5:55 am friday october 30th 2015. walking between buildings at work i noticed a single bright flash of white light to the north of my position. i stopped and it pulsated again a bright white light that just didnt seem normal. i began to track what seemed to be a very dim lighted object traveling due south almost directly overhead. it pulsated once again and i was able to keep visual on said "object". it darted, for the lack of a better term, on an angle northwesterly. it pulsated once again, this time i lost track of the faint "object". it again pulsated but in a totally new location south/southeast of my location. at this time of the morning i see plenty of commercial aircraft and this didn't exibit the normal lighting or flight characteristics of this aircraft. i just stood there in amazement and wondered what the hell i had just seen.It never pulsated again and was gone from sight...Whatever it was. the light was so brilliant compared to the white lights of nearby commerical aircraft.
content.summary: Strange pulsating single white light

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was at work taking out the trash about 130am.                  
2.I just had a feeling to look up to the sky.
3. when i frist looked up i thought i just was seeing the stars at night but it was moving from the east to the west.
4. there were more than i could count all moving from east to west like they were jets but all of them had a solid white light no flashing lights like on a plane or jet. the strange part is that the three stars of oriens belt were some of the lights that moved a crossed the sky. 
5.I was thinking that they were missiles then thought it was the air force moving in a huge night time maneuvers or relocating a fleet of jets. i stood in the parking lot for a round five mins watching them move from the east to the west. after some time watching them i went home with a sense of aww and fear.
6.I stop watching thinking i was ether crazy or letting my imagination get the best of me.
content.summary: All the stars in the sky moved from the east to the west

content.detailedDescription: They are here and i know where they are and there are so many of them i really don't know what to to anymore.They want leave me alone i know all about them and what they look like they are not what every one goes on about they are like nothing you have ever seen before.Okay here goes,  these aliens are invisible? content.detailedDescription:
Grey ball ufo spectacular occurs in 1992 !!!
30.11.1992, karlsruhe/germany, durlacher-tor place.
i and my colleague walking on foot-patrol in our area (working as securityman at the state-government). at time 21.55 h my colleague see first a strange thing in the nightsky, and say "look to this !!".
and the action on sky whats than moved i never foreget in my liftime.
a very big grey ball take abstract movements in zig-zag-course on the nightsky. slightly larger as venus in the nightsky, so estimated
airliner size. itâ´s takes radical change of direction on a speed like min. 3000 kmph. standing still for seconds on times, invisible for milliseconds, and jump so around in a airspace of ca. 3,5 x 3,5 km. it was not realy self light shiny, and looks grey and not white like normal stars (i think it was only visible because it was illuminated from below by the city lights). i guess the object diameter ca. 25 - 35 meter, and the altitude on ca. 3000 - 5000 meter, the flying altitude was very constance all times. sometimes the object lingered for about 1-2
seconds at a position. after about 3 min raced the object with even much higher
speed (approximately +5000 kmph) straight to the west to view the horizon. here, the object was at least as fast as in the atmosphere penetrating meteorite.
this thing gots no sound, no contrails and no engine-fire or so.
the incident was reported to a german ufo research centre (gep), and is regarded as inexplicable.
one thing is certain, the maneuvers and the speed of the object was clearly too fast for this world and the normal physik ....
exactly the same object displays, for example, a nasa video
shows. mid-nineties-years nasa has more of these objects
recorded
content.summary: A very big grey ball take abstract movements in zig-zag-course

content.detailedDescription: Massive. this is all i will submit on this form.
content.summary: Massive

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside tonight when my boyfriend called for me to come see a strange light from the perspective of our front driveway. i saw a bright glowing saturated orange orb hover in the night sky. at first, i thought it might be a planet (like mars), but then i realized it was hovering, actually moving smoothly (intentionally) horizontally and vertically, was much larger and saturated in color than a planet would be. also, the light was glowing from within -- it wasn't directional or a "beam" of light, so it didn't look like a small aircraft or a drone. and it didn't have any blinking lights on it. it looked like a bright orange fireball that was somewhat stationary, but moving very intentionally at times. i was in awe of this glowing ball and overwhelmed. it finally glowed really bright and flickered once, became instantly smaller, and then faded out to a small dot and disappeared as if it had quickly zoomed away. we tried to capture it on our ipad and iphone, with one poor quality image to show for it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a bright glowing orange orb hover and move oddly in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with my cat. taking her for her play time. looking at the sky as normal. and seen this cylinder shape object. it was a very solid white color. very bright. didn't look like it had any lights at all. i didn't think it was a plane. seem too big to be one. and was moving very slowly. and then disappeared into the clouds. i have a picture. but it looks like an orb going behind a cloud.
content.summary: Seen a cylinder shape very white object in the east.

content.detailedDescription: this is a report on an alien spacecraft sighting that i encountered march 3, 1995 at between 11:30 and 12 midnight. i believe this is the source of the all seeing eye we all know too well of. the image above the pyramid, the illuminati, ancient aliens and so many many others that are associated with this eye image. this spacecraft looked exactly like a human eye from the angle that i viewed it from, which in my opinion is the spacecrafts desired forward motion. although i am certain it could maneuver in any direction it so desired. i was traveling ne on interstate us.270 in st.Louis county and had just crossed interstate us.64(route 40, we call it highway 40), when all of a sudden coming sw directly at us ( a friend from work was riding with me), a streak of white light appeared and when this streak that had what seemed to be a tail trailing it, stopped in an instant and the tail of it caught up to it. like a fireworks sparkle that you twirl around and it has that reddish orange tail that comes from the ignited flame part of the sparkle. it stopped for a moment on the west side of the highway then slowly moved to the east side of the highway. whenever it moved it left exact transparent images of itself that caught up with the original spacecraft when it stopped. it's the same as you would see if you set your computer mouse pointer to leave trails, it then moved back to the west side of the highway us.270 leaving the same transparent tail of images of itself that caught up to the solid original spacecraft. it stopped for a moment again. then suddenly it dropped down to just below the treetops. again leaving a tail trail of transparent images of itself as it moved. once behind the trees it looked as though it pivoted and turned to the eye looking forward direction that i spoke of, then in a flash disappeared to the west. my friend and i sat saying nothing to each other for maybe 20 to 30 seconds, when i finally had to say, "man did you see that?", he said,"yeah man i saw it but i was not going to say anything to you or anyone else because people will only say you are crazy." he said this to me when i have told him many times of the things i have witnessed because then he finally admitted that he has seen many strange beings and things but he will never tell anyone because all they will say is that you are crazy. my response was i don't care what they say, i know what i just saw and anyone that has a ear to listen i am telling them about this and exactly what i saw. the highway was packed with cars in both directions. it was a busy and very active friday night. many had to see this spacecraft. the following day reports came from all states that bordered missouri and in missouri. even a news reporter said she and her husband saw a strange streak of light that night on her way home from work that night. thank you all for your time and reading another one of my experiences. i also have part of a documentary where at least 5 air force personnel saw the same craft and the description and animation that was rendered is as accurate as can be to what i witnessed. i was surprised and very happy when i viewed this, that someone else had seen the same exact spacecraft. they may not have seen it at the same angle as i did but its the same neon colored spacecraft that looks exactly like a human eye. if you could do some 3d rendering you could tell this craft in this video looks like an eye. peace be with you and stay safe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: it was neon in appearance and had a black center. it looked like a human eye.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out on patio which i have a due west vision and looked up and seen five very bright lights soccer ball size in a straight vertical pattern equaldistant from each other.My view is about 10 miles from the start of the mountains. i live about 40 miles from denver airport.The sky was black so i could not make out any shape but the lights.I watched the a andlights travel in a straight line over the mountains getting smaller as they got farther away until they were out of sight.Total time was 10 t0 15 minutes.Much slowe than a commercial airliner with no running lights.I watach the sky every day and nights for various periods and have yet to see anything like this before.
content.summary: Five red lights straight vertical line bright as led soccer balll size

content.detailedDescription:
1: standing in my back yard looking out over lake michigan

2:how bright it is, (it's still there) and that it doesn't move.

3: strange that it wasn't moving for as bright as it is, it's not a plane

4:it looks to be in a kind of diamond shape, with white lights steady on, and rotating/flashing blue and red lights.

5: i would seriously like to know what this is, it is kind of freaky.
 it showed up about four years ago one night around 2am.. then it was gone, just disappeared.

i happened to be standing out back this recent august and boom there it was again..It is brighter this time around, the weird part is... this time.. it is still there.. almost every night since august.

same spot in the sky same lights

i have tried to film it... but nothing comes out. 

my wife and son have also tried to no avail.


6:the first time i noticed it it was only in the sky for one night.
 this time it has been in the sky for almost every night
content.summary: Steady hovering lights blinking/rotating

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were fishing in keaton beach, fl and after pulling the boat out of the water, we noticed a big object in the sky to the west. it was a big rectangular shaped object moving very slow towards the south. we had no idea what the object was when we first saw it so a ufo came to mind. we took two pictures 40' apart from the same road. the object appeared to be moving the whole 30 minutes that we watched it. we had to leave the area while the object was still in the sky.
content.summary: Viewed the object for several moving very slowly southward while standing outside my vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, on my way to work this morning i experienced something very unusual. i drive the same route every day to work. this morning, however, was very different. i was driving, the roads and the sky clear as ever, and all of a sudden i hit this extremely thick patch of fog, it was so thick i couldn't see a foot ahead of me! then something red caught my eye. at first i though it was a cell phone tower. but it was "flying" beside me in the distance. and when i looked at it, it shot up in the sky directly over my car. i was in absolute shock! so here i am, in the middle of the road, stopped in traffic. but honestly, i didn't hear any horns beeping, see any lights flashing at me, nothing! once again, i'm frozen! i look (stare) at this thing in the sky over me! it had red lights on it. but instead of just sitting still over me it was flashing it's lights in patterns, first, 2 lights on the sides flashed, then 2 lights in the middle flashed, then it just started making patterns with its lights, and started making weird flying patterns in the sky. i tried to take pictures and video, but my phone wouldn't focus, and every time i put my phone on video it would some how switch right back to picture mode! and just as quick as it came, it shot up in the sky and i swear to you, i look back at the road and it was just as clear as ever, like nothing ever happened. like it was never foggy! after it happened, i felt sick! and i still feel that way. and it's been hours since this happened. i am in complete and utter shock. still! i've always joked, saying "oh i'd love to see a ufo" but after this, i don't ever want to see anything like this again!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was beside me in the distance then it was over my car and just vanished after about a minute or so. very scary
